Implementation of sequence models, here LSTM RNN to predict emoji for a given line of text. The achieved accuracy is  76%.

### Data:
[Emojify Dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/alvinrindra/emojify)

### Code:
[Google Colab Notebook](https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1j0XXMne7iM4jtpvwa-hDKC2_4d-_jngE?usp=sharing)
